mapper.insert: insert into workInfo SELECT conCat('W',subStr(contractID,3))as workInfoID, contractID, #{workMonth}as workMonth, #{workStartDay}as workStartDay , #{workEndDay}as workEndDay, #{workTime}as workTime, null , date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d'), null FROM contract WHERE employeeID=#{employeeID} AND workStartDay >= #{contractBeginDate} AND status = '1'
mapper.select:
select w.workMonth as workMonth, w.workInfoID as employeeID, e.employeeName as employeeName, w.workTime as workTime, s.transportExpense as transportExpense, t.transport as transport
from ems.workinfo w left join ems.employee e on w.workInfoID = e.employeeID left join ems.salaryinfo s on w.workInfoID = s.employeeID left join ems.transport t on w.workInfoID = t.employeeID where employeeID=#{employeeID}
mapper.update: update workInfo set workStartDay=#{workStartDay}, workEndDay=#{workEndDay}, workTime=#{workTime}, updateDate=date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') where employeeID=#{employeeID} AND workMonth=#{workMonth}
